name: Screw This Bullshit!
description:
The life of a Minotaur isn't easy.

Living in a maze is literally a dead-end job, and killing young Atheneans has just lost its spark to you.

When a new hero appears within your labyrinth, you refuse to kill him, deciding instead to race him to the exit. Maybe then you can finally take a vacation!

Race Theseus while avoiding traps in this button smashing, maze adventure!

MADE BY TEAM GTFO FOR THE 2019 CREATIVE JAM

Karel Bouchard: Rig, Level Art

Manu Boucher: Sound dSesign

Hugo Derome: Game Design, Level Design

Aelig Le Henaff: Character Art, Tech Anim

Pierre Le Henaff: Programmer

Marie-Noel Vanasse: Animation, Cinematics

Vienna Von Arx: Character Design, UI Design
